Name: Miura type epiphyseal chondrodysplasia
Definition: A bone developmental disease characterized by tall stature
Synonym: tall stature-scoliosis-macrodactyly of the halluces syndrome

Name: split hand-foot malformation
Definition: A bone development disease characterized by malformation of the central rays of the autopod and presenting with syndactyly

Name: Fuhrmann syndrome
Definition: A bone development disease that is characterized by bowing of the femora

Name: spondylocarpotarsal synostosis syndrome
Definition: A bone development disease that is characterized by postnatal progressive vertebral fusions frequently manifesting as block vertebrae

Name: clubfoot
Definition: A bone development disease where one or both are inclined inwards

Name: obsolete malignant neoplasm of scapula and long bones of upper limb
Definition: A bone development disease where one or both are inclined inwards

Name: dysostosis
Definition: A bone development disease that results in defective ossification of located in bone.

Name: osteochondrodysplasia
Definition: A bone development disease that results_in defective development of cartilage or bone.

Name: obsolete primary Spirochaetales infectious disease
Definition: A bone development disease that results_in defective development of cartilage or bone.

Name: obsolete Treponema infectious disease
Definition: A bone development disease that results_in defective development of cartilage or bone.
